5 Windows platforms

5.3 New Start menu shortcuts require HTML browser

MLWorks 2.0 includes Start-menu shortcuts that invoke an HTML browser on HTML versions of the MLWorks User Guide and the MLWorks Reference Manual.

MLWorks does not include an HTML browser. If you do not have a browser installed, these shortcuts will have no effect.

MLWorks Release Notes version 2.0 - 28 Aug 1998
